dialogue.start: I'm tired of eating this mundane food everyday. Back home, I was the best cook in the village. Since coming here, I noticed we just rely on the food imported from the mainland. Being the entrepreneur I am, I bet I can make a name for myself just like back home. I've made a recipe in which I believe can knock off the trousers of the king. Gather these ingredients from the land and bring them back to me so I can get to cooking.
dialogue.completed: These are perfect! Here, let me serve you one right now...Muah! I present to you my dish: "__(NAME_OF_FOOD)__".
